",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:()=>{setIsLogin(!isLogin);setMessage('');},style:{background:'none',border:'none',color:'#007bff',textDecoration:'underline',cursor:'pointer'},children:isLogin?'Register here':'Login here'})]})})]})});};export default Login;
